lines.content: For more information, please refer to our [contributor's guide](https://oss-generic.github.io/process/).
splitUserInput = userInput.trim().split(" +"); //remove all excessive spaces in input
//Allows error message to be printed out before the trying to get next user input
@Command(name = "add", mixinStandardHelpOptions = true, description = "Adds a budget plan for the current month.")
@Option(names = {"-v", "--value"}, required = true, description = "Value of the current month's budget")
@Command(name = "delete", description = "Delete any budget set for the current month.")
@Command(name = "list", description = "Shows the budget for the current month.")
description = "Adds an expense in the current month to the database.")
@Option(names = {"-v", "--value"}, required = true, description = "Value of the expense item")
// do something with the name and value
description = "Deletes expense record(s) from the database "
+ "by the unique identifier (from list) or by the name.")
@Option(names = {"-n", "--name"}, required = true, description = "Name of the expense item")
@Option(names = {"-i", "--id"}, required = true, description = "Unique identifier of the expense item")
description = "Shows a list of all expenses, together with the sum of expenses in the current month. "
+ "The expenses will be automatically sorted in reverse chronological order.")
@Command(name = "add", mixinStandardHelpOptions = true, description = "Adds an income source.")
description = "Deletes an income source from the database by its unique identifier or by its name.")
@Option(names = {"-n", "--name"}, required = true, description = "Name of the income source")
@Option(names = {"-i", "--id"}, required = true, description = "Unique identifier of the income source")
@Command(name = "list", description = "Shows a list of all income sources for the current month.")
